attributes.action: Save greenbelt land at all cost as it is priceless
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It would appear that Gordon Brown and big business wont be happy until all greenbelt land is concreted over. Especially now that a government think tank has come away with the ridicules idea to abandon all greenbelt land in favour of development.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Savegreenbelt/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
